name: Brad
Description: Unluggy. You are Bradley. Although Bradley is awesome he lacks simple abilities in life. Don't be like Bradley. Do the mahi get the treats.

name: Rebecca
Description: Yus. You are Rebecca. You are awesome. You enjoy eating while lying down and putting crums in your bed.

name: Anton
Description: Hooray. You got Anton. You like long walks at the beach and dogs. You enjoy solving the rubik's cube.

name: Ross
Description: Congrats. You are Ross. Ross is a 10 out of 10. Nothing more to say here.

name: Cate
Description: Alright you are Cate. Cate is cool. Cool cate can rollerskate. Cool rollerskating Cate is always a mate.
